content:
# The move command executed successfully, confirming that I am now at the exact coordinates of the stone patch at (-14.5, -14.5).
# I will now attempt to place the stone furnace at this position.

# Placing the stone furnace at the stone patch.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(-14.5, -14.5))  # Attempt to place the stone furnace.
print(f'Furnace placed at: {furnace.position}')  # Confirm the placement of the furnace.
